long_description: The Onya Baby Nextstep Child Carrier is constructed from 100% recycled brushed polyester twill fabric and an Air-Mesh lining. It's soft and breathable for your baby, and you. Soft, ergonomic carrier holds your baby in a hip-friendly "M" or "spread-squat" position; wear it as a front pack or as a backpack-or even on your hip. Carrier is highly adjustable and provides a comfortable, properly supported seat for your baby along with excellent weight distribution for you. Sleeping hood offers head support, sun protection and extra coverage for the nursing mother. With 2 big zippered pockets, toy loops and a D-ring for your keys, you've got plenty of space to stash your stuff. Stylish, high-quality matching webbing and top-grade buckles pull it all together. To top it all off, the lightweight Onya Baby Nextstep Child Carrier offers a hidden seat so you'll never be caught without a seat for your little one again.
short_description: The Onya Baby Nextstep Child Carrier is constructed from 100% recycled brushed polyester twill fabric and an Air-Mesh lining. It's soft and breathable for your baby, and you.
